thread.title: BRIEF-Build-A-Bear Workshop Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.33

title: BRIEF-Build-A-Bear Workshop Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.33
text: February 15, 2018 / 11:58 AM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Build-A-Bear Workshop Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.33 Reuters Staff Feb 15 (Reuters) - Build-A-Bear Workshop Inc: * BUILD-A-BEAR WORKSHOP, INC. REPORTS FISCAL YEAR 2017 PRE-TAX INCOME ABOVE GUIDANCE * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.33 * Q4 REVENUE $107.6 MILLION VERSUS $110.3 MILLION * Q4 SAME STORE SALES FELL 8 PERCENT * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.43 * SEES FISCAL YEAR 2018 TOTAL REVENUE GROWTH TO BE SLIGHTLY POSITIVE * SEES 2018 DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE IN RANGE OF $0.53 TO $0.57 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.34, REVENUE VIEW $104.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.56 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
